"The temptation to form premature theories upon insufficient data is
the bane of our profession." - Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

Heya!

Just thought I would throw that out there before we continue to far.
Is anyone confused by anything thus far? I would imagine so in some
cases. :)

Of course I can't reveal all the hidden answers yet before the end,
but I figured I would open up the floor to anyone who had a question
or comment I can answer to. Perhaps I can clairify something your
character does know?

One thing I can clairify is that when Tuscon seemed to think that when
Noctorro said Seekers he was not talking of Scourge's troops. Seekers
generally reference mechs that turn into Jets. Scourge's guys are
called Sweeps and are different.

Be careful of assumptions, they can lead you down wrong paths. This is
not a critism but just helpful advice since we all do it from time to
time :)

- Preston
